name: Lost Heroes Chapter 1 - Character Maze
description:
"Short and bold Korean horror game"

On 2027,  Multiverse World is closing its doors.

The new Korean animatronics will be scrapped due to possible malfunctions, however original characters are being kept in hopes of a possible reorganization of the company.

Controls:

WASD, Arrow KeysMoveEIntract, Play Tape            

Find the Exit of The Maze (Character Maze).

Don't get caught by Bronze
